snippet.title: Blade Sight [10/13/2023] Build - WIP demo 'intro' stage
snippet.description:
Point the sky, suspended victim.

uh, weird intro thing i made for the new build, trying to adopt a more frequent update schedule for builds. please excuse the scaffolding
https://addaline.itch.io/blade-sight
it's here, im exhausted
there's a lot of new stuff, but this segment is kinda, old school, in a way

anyways, the plan now is to do weekly updates of whatever I have currently work in progress

so this build is somehow -less complete- than the others despite there being way more content, the scaffolding has been left up

if you want to check out the game feel and try out the combat mechanics at current time of upload, feel free to check it out!
